name: C.O.D.N.D
description:
Lost in a mysterious world, use your available weapons to reach the temple and survive. 

This game was created as part of the Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D Online Course from GameDev.tv. 

Controls:

WASD - move

Space - jump

Shift - run

LMB - shoot

RMB - zoom

CMB scroll - switch weapons

F - turn on the flashlight

Tips:

Monsters will perform an aggro animation before they attack. If other monsters are nearby, they will be alerted and also attack. Finish them fast to avoid this. 

Some monsters have a shorter aggro range but a higher range to alert their neighbors. 

The difficulty level will change monsters' aggro and alert ranges, their health, their damage, and their speed.
